tool_description: "Nearest Delhi Metro Station" API is a web service that provides users with the nearest Delhi Metro station based on the latitude and longitude coordinates provided as input.

api_list.name: Nearest Metro Station
api_list.description: This endpoint is a GET method API that returns the nearest Delhi Metro station along with its name, latitude, longitude, and Google Maps directions.

required_parameters.name: long
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the user's location.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the user's location.
